features: 【5-in-1】The portable karaoke microphone is designed for you to sing anywhere! Singing and karaoke is the obvious job done here, it can also record your songs, and act as a voice disguiser. Also an awesome portable speaker if you just want to enjoy some music. Even more surprising is that it also can be used as an FM radio. Perfect for KTV singing, gathering singing, family singing, travel singing, car stereo, instrument recording, interviews and live, ect.

【Designed for Professionals】Karaoke Microphone with 3 layered anti noise filter head, which can effectively reduce the air flow and wind noise produced when singing and dust interference, distortion free and anti-howling! Built-in dual high-quality large speakers bring 360-degree super surround feeling, immersive!

【Advanced Audio Controls】With VOLUME and REMIX sliding button itself has a louder and more sensitive output. Stunning KTV live-sound, and clear music rhythm with echo reverberation. Superior Mic with dual stereo speakers, you can connect smart phone via Bluetooth, AUX cable or insert U-disk and TF card max 32GB(Not Included), can make you listening and singing anytime and anywhere.

【Several Modes for Different Fun】Karaoke machine adopts perfect wireless design, connecting your smart device (iPhone, iPad, Android phone, tablet, PC, etc.) with the karaoke microphone through Bluetooth or 3.5mm audio cable to practice and share the favorite songs on music app, such as YouTube, Yokee Plano, Smule Karaoke, KUGO, etc

【What You Will Get】Built-in long-lasting capacity rechargeable battery. A great birthday or festival gift for your kids, friends or family. Buy it now to get: (1) Karaoke Microphone; (2) Micro USB cable; (3) Audio cable; (4)Instruction Manual. 【Tip: * Both 1A and 2A available,connect your karaoke microphones on the corresponding charging port.Usually the item will be fully charged after 4 hours and then please disconnect the device in time to advoid the over-heating issue.】

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KIDWILL 5-in-1 Kids Bluetooth Wireless Karaoke Microphone -Your Party On the Go We advise you stick your mouth fully into touching the mic to get louder and clearer sound.

3 Ways Connection & Universal CompatibIlitiy This wireless karaoke microphone supports Bluetooth Connection, Cable Connection & TF card(Max 32GB, NOT Included in the package) .Just connect your smart phone with AUX cable or Bluetooth, and then start the singing APP on your phone. You are capable of have a private party at home just like in the KTV! Keep away from phone signals away to prevent noise caused by magnetic field interference. U-Disk and TF Card Supported In addition to singing, the microphone can be functioned as a music player as well. If you have a U-disk or TF card (Max 32GB, U-disk & TF NOT Included in the package), you can insert it into the microphone, and listen to some beautiful music to relax yourself at spare time. Long Time Wireless Operation Configured long-lasting capacity rechargeable battery, you can sing or play music up to 5-8 hours in a wireless manner. Free from the inconvenience of having to charge it frequently, and no worry of power off until you have enough fun playing with this cute wireless microphone.

Added Protection Board for Built-in Battery We thoughtfully add a board on the built-in rechargeable battery to protect it from damage, so as to prolong its lifespan, and it will work and be charged more steadily, which will give you better usage experience. On Low Battery When the karaoke microphone is on low battery, it may produce noise or the sound would not be steady, you may need to charge it fully to get better sound effect. Multiple Charging This wireless karaoke microphone can be charged by power bank, charger, car charger, computer, etc. via the included charging cord. Enjoy your moving party right now! Please note: Max charging current should not be higher than 2A.

Specifications Battery Non-removable rechargeable battery Maximum output power 5W Maximum sound pressure level >115db 1KHz TDH<1% TF support format music format MP3 WAV Bluetooth transmission DIST 8-10M (26.3-32.8ft) TF maximum capacity 32 GB (NOT included) Reverb echo sound effect reverb Operating voltage 3.7V Noise ≥85db Power adapter DC5V/1000mA (can be used with cell phone charger) Tips 1 Advise you stick your mouth fully into touching the mic to get louder and clearer sound. Tips 2 Please make sure turn off the mute state and check whether the tuning quantity of the microphone is adjusted to the maximum once you turn on the karaoke microphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Using it more than my daughter
reviews.reviewText: I'm pretty sure I'm about to become famous because of this thing. I bought it for my 5 year old daughter who thinks she's a pop star. I thought she would love it. She opened it, and liked it, but didn't love it. UNTIL I paired it to my blue tooth and put on a show for her. At that point, she decided she loved it, but I was already really into my performance, so she didn't get it back. Anyway, probably going to tour with this mic as my band. Pretty excited. Great product, fun, and I totally wish I had one of these when I was a kid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What could be more fun??
reviews.reviewText: This small, inexpensive product is absolutely amazing! I've bought 3 of them now, 2 as gifts and one I keep at home for impromptu fun when guests are over. It honestly works better than most karaoke setups that cost $hundreds!! So simple to use, and the sound quality is amazing... startlingly amazing, when you consider the price of this product. It looks like a toy, but it's a powerhouse little fun tool! Disclosure: I was offered $15 to write a 5-star review but that happens a lot and I ONLY write the reviews that I actually believe deserve 5-stars. This one I did without hesitation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Neat gift, good idea
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift for a 6yo but the 2yr old loves it too, my only complaint really was how loud it is when you turn it on and off. If there’s a way to turn down the volume on that, I haven’t found it, otherwise, simple to pair with Bluetooth and decent sound as a mic and a speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids rock out
reviews.reviewText: Granddaughter loved this Christmas gift. Sang all kinds of songs in many voice styles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love them they were easy to hook up
reviews.reviewText: Use them for the Superbowl function at my house

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mediocre audio quality. Sliders for volume go from really low or really high. No in-between.
reviews.reviewText: I got this karaoke mic for my three-year-old daughter, and while it's fun to play around with, the audio quality is pretty bad. It sounds really tinny and flat, especially when you're playing music via Bluetooth - it's like the sound is coming out of a tin can. My daughter doesn't seem to care - she just likes to sing and make noise with it.One thing I do like about this mic is that it's really easy for kids to use. My daughter had no trouble figuring out how to turn it on and make silly noises. It's also pretty tough - my daughter has dropped it a few times already, but it's still working just fine.Overall, I'd say this is a decent option if you're looking for a toy to keep your kid entertained for a while. But if you're serious about your karaoke, or you want something with better sound quality, you should probably look for a higher-end model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandchildren loved it!
reviews.reviewText: My wife bought two for our grandchildren, one 2-year-old boy, one 4-year-old girl for Christmas. They both loved it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a Christmas gift. Came in quickly and charged. The mic are easy to connect bluetooth and have a volume for the music output and the singing output.It is easy to use for kids and they can get pretty loud. Can be use with music from a paired device or without anything and just singing.There is also a mode to change the voice to make it higher pitch or lower and sound robotic and use the "normal" voice.Charge quickly as well.My 4 and 6 years old use it easily without issues and they are LOVING it. You can add a micro SD and record the singing!!Really good gift !!!
Fue un regalo, les gustó mucho, tiene muchaa funciones
Es fácil de usar, no tiene luces de varios colores y el plástico no se ve de la mejor calidad
Impractico: hay que pegar la boca al microfono.
Mon fils l’a eu pour Noël, il est super. Possibilité de le mettre en Bluetooth ou même d’avoir la radio, le son est bien. Je recommande
